alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Kershaw; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:33PM EDT until August 15 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...EAST CENTRAL LEXINGTON...RICHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN KERSHAW COUNTIES... At 433 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Killian to SC State Farmer`s Market, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Camden, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, McEntire Air Base, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Eastover, Lugoff, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Sesquicentennial State Park, Lake Carolina, and SC State Fair Grounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 61 and 94. Interstate 26 between mile markers 104 and 122. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 28. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
